title: 09/16/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/16/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the USC head coaching position and the candidates for it. Cris Collinsworth shares stories about getting recruited by USC and tells us what Lamar Jackson needs to do this weekend against Kansas City. And Sean Salisbury explains what USC needs in their next Head Coach

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
